double-slash-comments.name: comment.line.double-slash.wai
double-slash-comments.comment: This is a single line comment. Single line comment starts with // and ends with \n

block-comments.name: comment.block.wai
block-comments.comment: This is a block comment. Block comment starts with /* and ends with */.

triple-slash-comments.name: comment.line.documentation.triple-slash.wai
triple-slash-comments.comment: This is a triple slash comment. Triple slash comment starts with /// and ends with \n. This represents a documentation comment.

block-doc-comments.name: comment.block.documentation.wai
block-doc-comments.comment: This is a block documentation comment. This starts with /** and ends with */. This represents a documentation comment.
